flawed_nl_solution:
She needs to type an additional 1000 - 200 = <<1000-200=8000>>8000 words.
In one minute she can type 300 words / 30 = <<300/30=10>>10 words.
It will take her 8000 / 10 = <<8000/10=800>>800 more minutes to finish typing the report.
#### 800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 800, not 8000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
